title: Requirements Gathering
description: Define the functional and non-functional requirements of KineticEnergyFloorTiles.

title: Design the Floor Tile System
description: Design a system that can generate electricity from footsteps and be suitable for high-traffic areas.

title: Develop Electronic Components
description: Design and develop the electronic components necessary for energy harvesting from footsteps.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for monitoring and managing the floor tiles.

title: Integrate Electronic Components with User Interface
description: Combine the developed electronic components and user interface into a functional system.

title: Test the KineticEnergyFloorTiles System
description: Perform thorough testing of the developed system to ensure it meets functional and non-functional requirements.
dependencies: Integrate Electronic Components with User Interface

title: Document KineticEnergyFloorTiles System
description: Write clear and concise documentation for the developed system.

title: Deploy and Install KineticEnergyFloorTiles System
description: Install the system in a suitable high-traffic area for testing.
